meanings.definition: The state or quality of being near.
meanings.sent1: The nearness of the park to our house makes it a convenient place to visit.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the nearness of my best friend's house to mine.
meanings.sent3: The nearness of the ice cream shop to the gym is both tempting and ironic.
meanings.sent4: The nearness of the finish line motivated the runners to push harder.
meanings.sent5: The nearness of the deadline added urgency to their work.

meanings.definition: The fact or condition of being close in space or time.
meanings.sent1: The nearness of the bus stop to my apartment is very convenient.
meanings.sent2: The nearness of the exam date is causing me some stress.
meanings.sent3: The nearness of the bakery to the office is a constant temptation for the employees.
meanings.sent4: The nearness of the storm made everyone rush to find shelter.
meanings.sent5: The nearness of the train station to the hotel was a pleasant surprise for the travelers.
